entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who has put an Unbreakable Charm on the jar to prevent the beetle from transforming.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who handed the glass jar back to Hermione.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is someone about whom the beetle was writing horrible lies.

entities.name: beetle
entities.description: The beetle is being kept in a glass jar and has been writing horrible lies with its quill.

entities.name: quill
entities.description: The quill is an object used by the beetle to write horrible lies.

entities.name: london
entities.description: London is a location where Hermione plans to release the beetle when they return.

entities.name: jar
entities.description: The jar is an object used by Hermione to keep the beetle.

relationships.description: Hermione owns the beetle and has put it in a jar.
Hermione uses the jar to keep the beetle.
Ron hands over the jar to Hermione.
